ghost

Interface Collide

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Actor, Cell, Ghost, Waka

    public interface Collide

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBottom()
      Returns the bottom boundary, as a y pixel coordinate.
      int getLeft()
      Returns the left boundary, as an x pixel coordinate.
      int getRight()
      Returns the right boundary, as an x pixel coordinate.
      int getTop()
      Returns the top boundary, as a y pixel coordinate.
      int getx()
      Returns the x coordinate of the object, either as pixel or grid coordinate.
      int gety()
      Returns the y coordinate of the object, either as pixel or grid coordinate.
      default boolean isCollide(Collide other)
      Return whether two objects have collided based on their boundaries, using their pixel coordinates for comparison.

    • Method Detail

        Returns the top boundary, as a y pixel coordinate.

        Returns the right boundary, as an x pixel coordinate.

        int getx()
        Returns the x coordinate of the object, either as pixel or grid coordinate.
        Returns:

      • gety

        int gety()
        Returns the y coordinate of the object, either as pixel or grid coordinate.
        Returns:
        the y coordinate, pixel or grid.

      • isCollide

        default boolean isCollide(Collide other)
        Return whether two objects have collided based on their boundaries, using their pixel coordinates for comparison.
        Parameters:
        other - another Collide object
        Returns:
        true if current object collides with the argument
